Symbol.Script_3D:
! --- hotspots at the ends --- hotspot 0, 0, 0 ! fix hotspot at the wall-end hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS, 0 ! fix hotspot at the wall-end
hotspot 0, 0, ZZYZX ! fix hotspot at the wall-end hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS, ZZYZX ! fix hotspot at the wall-end
unID = GS_HotspotUnIDBegin
if r0 < EPS then xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X"
hotspot -AC_CutWidth, additionIfMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot -AC_CutWidth-0.1, additionIfMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, additionIfMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
hotspot -AC_CutWidth, additionIfMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot -AC_CutWidth-0.1, additionIfMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, additionIfMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
hotspot -AC_CutWidth, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot -AC_CutWidth-0.1, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, 0, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
hotspot -AC_CutWidth, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot -AC_CutWidth-0.1, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, ZZYZX, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
del moveStepNum else
for i = 1 to 2 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 4+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 5, AC_CutWidth ! moving - display param: AC_CutWidth del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 if onWallBeg then hotspot 0, r0 + WALL_THICKNESS, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6 ! centerpoint unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, -r0, 1, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference unID = unID + 1 else hotspot 0, -r0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6 ! centerpoint unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, -r0, -1, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference unID = unID + 1 endif
hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 4+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot 0, WALL_THICKNESS, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 5, AC_CutWidth ! moving - display param: AC_CutWidth del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 if onWallBeg then hotspot 0, r0 + WALL_THICKNESS, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6 ! centerpoint unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, r0 + WALL_THICKNESS, 1, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference unID = unID + 1 else hotspot 0, -r0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6+revAngleExtra ! centerpoint unID = unID + 1 hotspot 0, -r0, -1, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference unID = unID + 1 endif
addz ZZYZX
next i del 2
endif
end
!**************************** SUBROUTINES ****************************!
! ===== move the coorinate system to a given X coordinate ===== "move the coorinate system to X":
additionIfMirr = 0 additionNotMirr = 0 if r0 > EPS then
if onWallBeg then addy r0+WALL_THICKNESS rotz (xMoveTo / (r0 + WALL_THICKNESS/2)) / PI * 180 addy -r0-WALL_THICKNESS else addy -r0 rotz -(xMoveTo / (r0 + WALL_THICKNESS/2)) / PI * 180 addy r0 endif
moveStepNum = 3
else
if SYMB_MIRRORED then additionIfMirr = xMoveTo * tan(wallIncl) else additionNotMirr = xMoveTo * tan(wallIncl) endif
addx xMoveTo moveStepNum = 1
endif
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
! --- hotspots at the ends --- hotspot2 0, 0 ! fix hotspot at the wall-end hotspot2 0, WALL_THICKNESS ! fix hotspot at the wall-end
unID = GS_HotspotUnIDBegin
if r0 < EPS then xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X"
hotspot2 -AC_CutWidth, additionIfMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 -AC_CutWidth-0.1, additionIfMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 0, additionIfMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
hotspot2 -AC_CutWidth, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 1+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 -AC_CutWidth-0.1, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 3 ! reference unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 0, WALL_THICKNESS+additionNotMirr, unID, AC_CutWidth, 2 ! moving unID = unID + 1
del moveStepNum else revAngleExtra = 0 if not(onWallBeg) then revAngleExtra = 512 endif
hotspot2 0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 4+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = -0.1 gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot2 0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot2 0, 0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 5, AC_CutWidth ! moving - display param: AC_CutWidth del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 if onWallBeg then hotspot2 0, r0 + WALL_THICKNESS, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6+revAngleExtra ! centerpoint else hotspot2 0, -r0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6+revAngleExtra ! centerpoint endif unID = unID + 1
hotspot2 0, WALL_THICKNESS, unID, cutWidthAngle, 4+128 ! base unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = -0.1 gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot2 0, WALL_THICKNESS, unID, cutWidthAngle, 7 ! reference del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 xMoveTo = AC_CutWidth gosub "move the coorinate system to X" hotspot2 0, WALL_THICKNESS, unID, cutWidthAngle, 5, AC_CutWidth ! moving - display param: AC_CutWidth del moveStepNum unID = unID + 1 if onWallBeg then hotspot2 0, r0 + WALL_THICKNESS, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6+revAngleExtra ! centerpoint else hotspot2 0, -r0, unID, cutWidthAngle, 6+revAngleExtra ! centerpoint endif unID = unID + 1
endif
end
!**************************** SUBROUTINES ****************************!
! ===== move the coorinate system to a given X coordinate ===== "move the coorinate system to X":
additionIfMirr = 0 additionNotMirr = 0 if r0 > EPS then
if onWallBeg then add2 0, r0+WALL_THICKNESS rot2 (xMoveTo / (r0 + WALL_THICKNESS/2)) / PI * 180 add2 0, -r0-WALL_THICKNESS else add2 0, -r0 rot2 -(xMoveTo / (r0 + WALL_THICKNESS/2)) / PI * 180 add2 0, r0 endif
moveStepNum = 3
else
if SYMB_MIRRORED then additionIfMirr = xMoveTo * tan(wallIncl) else additionNotMirr = xMoveTo * tan(wallIncl) endif
add2 xMoveTo, 0 moveStepNum = 1
endif
return
